fixes.name: Select Year
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau parameter 'Select Year' which is defined as the literal 1896 into a DAX measure returning the same constant. In Power BI, parameters/parameter-based calculations are represented as measures and referenced using SELECTEDVALUE when used in other expressions.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This represents a Tableau parameter (a static value). Per the rules, any calculation involving or representing a parameter must be created as a measure.
